course_description: Using uniform laws and Georgia statutes, this course surveys the law of trusts and estates, including intestate succession, requirements for a valid will, testamentary capacity and volition, will construction, planning for incapacity, trust formation, the rights of trust beneficiaries and creditors, and the powers and duties of trustees.
sections: Class Nbr: 2897, Section #: 01, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 8:15-10:15a, Instructor: S. Donaldson, Status: Open
